pages.text: park pizza co PLEASE CALL US TO PLACE ANY ORDER OR FOR QUESTIONS REGARDING ORDERING.MONDAY - FRIDAY: 11AM - 10PMSATURDAY: 4PM - 10PMSUNDAY: CLOSED (843) 225-PARK (843) 225-7275 FOR DELIVERIES: We deliver only to Park Circle and parts of Hanahan$8.00 order minimum + $1.00 delivery charge. Credit or Debit Only. No cash.Last delivery taken at 9:15 every night menu pizza of the month Chori Pollo Queso Blanco, Mozzarella, Chorizo, Chicken, Tajin-seasoned Black Beans and topped with diced White Onions and Cilantro 10″ pizza $13.75 12″ pizza $ 18.75 16″ pizza $25.75 Calzone $13.75 park pizzas * MAKE ANY PIZZA INTO A CALZONE! * CALZONES WILL BE SERVED WITH A SIDE OF MARINARA ONLY IF THE PIZZA HAS AN EXISTING MARINARA BASE.
